July 27, 1929 D Burley Contest
Burley Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
burley-contest
None
A Souvenir of the Opera
Recreation Ground, Burley-in-Wharfedale, Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2.10s. March contest (own choice) - 1st Bullcroft, 2nd Harrogate, 3rd Ripon. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 9, 2013, 4:21 p.m. Dec. 1, 2018, 7:47 p.m.
1 Bullcroft Miners Ambulance William Park
2 Harrogate Silver Nathan Sidebottom
3 Yeadon Old Band Walter Jackson
Unknown Result Ripon City Band Harry W. Hill
Unknown Result Horsforth Subscription H. B. Fieldhouse
Unknown Result Black Dyke Mills Junior Hubert Hepworth
